front.title: SRv6 Resource Programming with NRP flavor

abstract.t: This document introduces a new flavor type for SRv6 called "Flavor NRP". It associates the SRv6 End.X SID with a set of network resource partitions (referred to as NRP resources). By using the End.X SID with the NRP flavor type, SRv6 policies can provide programmability for network resources.
